name: Innominate Daemon
description:
A difficult Boss Battle game in which you play as Daemon. Everytime you die you'll leave behind a body which you can use to power yourself up. Be warned there may only be up to 4 bodies when you die, if there are more random bodies will be deleted.

Survive the fight by properly managing your bodies, dodging projectiles and defeating the boss.

This game was created for the Home of Nerds Game Jam. For this reason the game does not have a tutorial, please take your time to read the controls menu and help menu found in the main menu before playing. This will make your experience more enjoyable!

We hope you enjoy the game.
